title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Intelligent Learning Platform-Based Higher Education Political Ideology Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of political systems and foundational concepts of social structures
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate an understanding of core concepts in political thought theory at or above 85% using an intelligent platform.
Learners can propose solutions to real-world problems related to political thought through online discussions and collaborative tools.
Learners can evaluate alternatives for political education design by applying a Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) framework.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
